response.overview: The Manadonese Senna is about to embark on her first journey to explore her roots in Indonesia. A week before her departure, she attempts to connect with her mother Annie and other family members. Her efforts fail one by one, until she reveals a secret. Will Senna be able to break through her motherâ€™s silence?
response.tagline: In searching for her roots, Senna discovers the weight of silence.
response.title: Sudah
